Reviews.Content: very nice place I lived here for 2 months. The place is specialized in long stay so the rooms are customized keeping that in mindThe good things1. Very friendly staff, especially the the asian lady and the elderly person (but I think he was about to retire)2. Clean rooms, very effecient service. 3. Weekly wine get togethers at the reception every wednesday4. location, in terms of proximity of public transport (right outside the door)5. Comfi beds6. Well equiped kitchenette7. Very quick to accept the fact that they lost my jacket in laundary and reimbursed me for a new one8. Good places to eat in the surrounding areasThe things that could have been better1. Rooms (single) small and narrow. Would have been better if the room could have been more wider and larger2. Gym was really under equipped and small. Just one elliptical, 2 cycles and 2 other machines. For a long stay a good gym is really essentail
Reviews.Author: dum_chick_dum_dum
